name: RandomGiftGenerator
0:
”Alexa, open gift generator”
”Alexa, open gift generator and give me a gift idea”
”give me a random gift”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gift generator
des:
This skill was created to help you with gift ideas, it has weird gift ideas for the person that you need a gift idea for, it also has normal gift ideas as well, but normal is boring.

Ask the skill to give you a random gift idea and see what it can come up with, this skill uses a database and a random number generator to pull back a gift idea for you, if it repeats a previous gift just ask it agin.

It has over a hundred gift ideas for all ages, and can help you if you are stuck for ideas.

Here is the full list of Utterances you can ask:

random gift
gift
give me a random gift
give me a gift idea
gift idea
what can i get as a gift
generate me a gift
give me a gift
get me a random gift
generate a random gift
i need to buy a gift
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
